title: Testing Excellence Hub
description: Learn about global best practices in testing and automation and how they can improve your business.

syllabus.title: ISTQB Foundation 4.0 Syllabus
syllabus.description: The ISTQB Foundation Level Certification (version 4.0) provides essential knowledge of software testing. This syllabus outlines the key topics covered, including testing fundamentals, lifecycle, static techniques, and more.

sections.title: 1. Fundamentals of Testing
sections.content: This section covers the basics of software testing including definitions, objectives, and principles.

sections.title: 2. Testing Throughout the Software Lifecycle
sections.content: Learn about the role of testing in different software development models and phases.

sections.title: 3. Static Testing
sections.content: Static techniques, including reviews and inspections, are covered in this section.
